basics.name: Ioana-Andreea Grapa
basics.label: Event Manager
basics.summary: I am a creative, dynamic and organised event manager who enjoys bringing people together to share common passions. Sociable, enthusiastic and a doer, I look for challenges at every corner. I love travelling, am a huge foodie and love being outdoors.   It is my belief that travelling and acquiring international experience has an immense impact on an individual's ability of integrating in a changing and dynamic environment, creating confident social networks and becoming open-minded towards future projects. In addition, travelling nurtures my interest for cross-cultural experiences, which impact on habits, behaviour, beliefs and values.

work.summary: I have autonomously project managed Twilio’s sponsored particpation in several tech events in Germany (Berlin, Hannover, Munich) and co-organised Twilio’s sponsorship at Mobile World Congress (Barcelona). With an yearly allocated budget of €200,000, my main responsibilities involved securing sponsorship contracts, designing expo booths and collateral, conducting email marketing campaigns, on-site networking, logistical support and internal reporting. Supported Twilio by improving brand awareness, engaging with attendees and generating over 500 leads through events in the German market.
highlights: Build an algorithm for artist to detect if their music was violating copy right infringement laws
Optimized an algorithm that holds the current world record for Weisman Scores

work.summary: Having managed a community of 27,000 data enthusiasts, I fully organised, ran and spoke at the largest Big Data Meetups across 16 European cities. I have also lead the organisation of the annual Data Natives Conference, which attracted over 1000 attendees in Berlin & Tel Aviv, with a budget of €150,000. Sold and secured sponsorship for various events from companies like IBM, Deloitte, HPE and Google, among others.
